Key Match Events: Marcus Stoinis smashed the winning SIX as Australia secured its first victory in the ICC World Cup 2023. Sri Lanka bowlers fought hard but there was not much to defend. Australia won by 5 wickets
Josh Inglis smashed 50 and looked wonderful today under pressure
Dilshan Madushanka clinched his 3rd wicket to depart Marnus Labuschagne
Pre-Game Insights: Cummins has indicated that the blueprint for success is simple - win every match from here on.
Kusal Mendis says he has belief the abilities of his batters and bowlers.
There is a 76% chance that Australia will be victorious in this match.
Pat Cummins says his team has been off the mark and were outplayed in both the games.
Every game now becomes almost like a final. You've got to win just about all of them…
The mood in the camp has been fantastic. Everyone's great. Everyone's desperate to turn it around.
The forthcoming matches will be pivotal in determining whether the five-time world champions can move ahead to the tournament’s knockout stages.
Post-Match Reflections: Cummins said the mood in their dressing room is great despite two successive hammerings in their opening games.
Australia secured its first victory in the ICC World Cup 2023.
The Australian bowlers did well to stage a fine comeback with leg-spinner Adam Zampa showing the way with four wickets in the innings that was briefly interrupted by rain.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Stadium in Lucknow has historically been known for being a playground for spinners and slower bowlers, often resulting in low-scoring contests.
The fresh wickets prepared for the World Cup, crafted from black soil, displayed some vitality, at least in the initial innings of the Australia vs South Africa match.
South African fast bowlers claimed 6 out of the 10 Australian wickets.
The weather conditions in Lucknow are set to be hazy and not as hot.

The temperature is expected to range between 33 degrees to 21 degrees Celsius and winds are expected to blow at the speed of around 9 km/hr in the east direction in the day and 11 km/h north-east in the night.
Others: The Australian team has been struggling in the World Cup, losing their first two matches.
The Sri Lankan team has also been struggling, but they have shown some promise in their previous matches.
The match will be played at the Ekana Stadium in Lucknow, which has a reputation for being a challenging pitch for batsmen.
